jde.juci
Class WrappedRuntimeException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          java.lang.RuntimeException
              jde.juci.WrappedRuntimeException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class WrappedRuntimeException
extends java.lang.RuntimeException

A nondescript, unchecked exception class that allows chaining/wrapping of exception references so that wrapped and rethrown exceptions can preserve the information from the original exception.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Nick Sieger
See Also:
